nodes.text: This individual was a pirate in Kragan Gorr's pirate gang. This pirate participated in the attack on the independent refueling station known as the Colossus, and uttered a high-pitching, whooping war cry as the Warbirds charged into battle.
During the raid, an ear-piercing disturbance was transmitted over the pirate's shared comm channel. While this pirate was stunned by it, his fighter was shot down and crashed into the ocean.
The pirate wore stormtrooper armor and helmet, customized with painted detailing, as well as the insignia of the Warbirds on the chest plate.
Credited as Random Pirate, this character first appeared in "The Triple Dark", the second episode of Star Wars Resistance, and is voiced by Fred Tatasciore.
